text:
Operations Engineer | ONSITE, Santa Barbara,CA | $85k-200k Procore Technologies

Join us oceanside and come build the software that builds the world!

Procore provides cloud-based construction management software to clients across the globe and is seeking an experienced Operations Engineer to help lead our growing DevOps team. Our team believes in an Agile development environment, test driven development, and we place an emphasis on open collaboration and ownership.

We have many different opportunities avaliable. Learn more at www.procore.com/jobs
